Detailed Description

Class to handle and decode MIDI sounds.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AmrSound::AmrSound (   ) 
 

If the default constructor is used, the parameters have to be provided by using the method Init.

AmrSound::AmrSound (  BinData *  bin_data  )  [explicit]
 

Initializes an MIDI sound with the given bin_data.

Parameters:
bin_data Pointer to a binary data stream which contains the i-melody data. After passing the binary data stream, the stream is obtained by the MIDI sound and hence automatically released in the destructor of the MIDI sound.

Initializes an MIDI sound with the given bin_data.
